csw:Record.dc:title: Commercial Radio Occultation Level 1B data - Lemur-2
csw:Record.dc:subject: Radio Occultation
Level 1 Data
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
The Commercial Radio Occultation (RO) service uses Spire L0, L1a and L1b commercial radio occultation data procured from the contractor Spire, originating from the STRATOS Radio Occultation payload on the Lemur-2 satellites. Based on the raw measurements provided by Spire's nanosatellite constellation, EUMETSAT generates bending angle Spire-derived L1b products in netCDF and BUFR format. The Spire-derived L1b netCDF products are disseminated in near-real time via EUMETCast Terrestrial.
The Spire-derived L1b BUFR products are disseminated in near-real time via EUMETCast Satellite and Terrestrial, and via the GTS.
